FuncDef: This command configures the source bits forref1orref2timing reference. There are restrictions on the source-bits location forref1andref2based on platform. Refer to the description of theref1command for details. This command is only applicable to the 7750 SR-c12 chassis.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the chassis slot and MDA containing the BITS port to be used as one of the two timing reference sources in the system timing subsystem. Values-slot:	1
mda:		1 to 12.
